Issues: Patient’s health status difference will cause utilization pattern difference

Benefit difference will induce utilization pattern change. When comparing actual episode cost against target for outcome based payment adjustment, significant benefit change between baseline and performance year should be adjusted and normalized
Impact to Pharma:
1.Benefit becomes richer : Unfavorable
2.Benefit becomes learner : Favorable
Adjustment Methodology: Compare actuarial value between baseline and performance year products and apply induced utilization factors to normalize the difference
